fields_of_interest: Consumers, International co-operation and development, Business and Industry, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: We follow the development in the financial and payment sector, as well as the promotion of innovative startup. Main area of interest are PSD2, and Horizon 2020.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Pagita envision a future where digital and physical worlds are connected. 
We believe startup business should be encouraged thru a mix of policies regarding funding, tax relief, and deregulation/sandboxing, in order to remove obstacles to the deployment of innovative services.
